    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Commentary</string>
            <string language="es">Comentario</string>
            <string language="ga">Tráchtaireaht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kommentar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Commentaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Commentary</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχόλια</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Interactive group activity where children experiment with commentaries and deal with chance elements in a composition.</string>
            <string language="es">Actividad de grupo interactiva donde los niños experimentan con comentarios y tratan elementos fortuitos en una composición</string>
            <string language="ga">Gníomhaíocht grúpa idirghníomhach ina ndéanann na leanaí turgnamh le tráchaireachtaí agus déileálann siad le heilimintí seans i gcumadh.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Music</string>
            <string language="es">Música. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive Gruppe Aktivität, wo Kinder mit 
Kommentaren experimentieren und zufällige Elemente in einem Aufbau 
beschäftigen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Activité interactive de groupe où les enfants 
expérimentent avec des commentaires et traitent les éléments 
fortuits dans une composition.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atividade interativa do grupo onde as crianças 
experimentam com os commentaries e tratam dos elementos chance em uma 
composição.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attività interattiva del gruppo dove i bambini 
sperimentano con i commenti e si occupano degli elementi chance in una
composizione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική δραστηριότητα ομάδας όπου τα παιδιά 
πειραματίζονται με τα σχόλια και εξετάζουν τα στοιχεία 
πιθανότητας σε μια σύνθεση.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
